fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your first target will be granted Invincible defense, be cured of all negative effects, be Astral for the night and secretly be lynchproof the next day.
- Your second target will be roleblocked through immunity and roleblock all their non-Coven visitors.
- Redirect, roleblock and prevention immune.
- Your visits are Astral.
- You may judge yourself.
- With the Necronomicon, you may select a target each day to deal a Powerful attack to. The attack will come at the end of the day. Additionally, all other non-Coven day abilities will fail to work while you are alive.
